issue.title: freemagazines.top
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://freemagazines.top/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ffreemagazines.top%2F) ### Comment > https://freemagazines.top/ detects adguard again... like a weekly thing at this point. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/lmo23xcju1w48g0o4sgww0gog04ckcg7messwnu1eg.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.20.2 (4988) System version: | Windows 11 24H2 (10.0.26100.3775) Browser: | Edge AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `1.1.1.1`
Filters: | Ad blocking:

EasyList Italy Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?browser=Edge&browsing_security.enabled=true&filters=103.202.1.4.6.9.16.18.19.20.21.22.23.109.208.224.2&manifest_version=2&product_type=Ext&product_version=4.4.50&stealth.enabled=false&system_version=Windows+11&utm_campaign=report&utm_medium=popup&utm_source=browser_extension&dns.servers=1.1.1.1)
